alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 01 at 2:41AM MST until February 03 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Guadalupe County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes portions of I-40. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bitterly cold low temperatures mostly in the single digits above zero are expected Wednesday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
